channel.title: Uwe Hermann's Music Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Uwe Hermann
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music-only podcast by Uwe Hermann, playing freely available music (Creative Commons) of various artists and genres.
channel.itunes:summary: Music-only podcast by Uwe Hermann, playing freely available music (Creative Commons) of various artists and genres.
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.

item.title: Uwe Hermann's Music Podcast
item.description:
Welcome to my music podcast, featuring freely available Creative Commons-licensed (podsafe) music by various artists and from various music genres such as electronica, celtic, world, classical, acoustic, pop, rock, and many more.

Contact me: If you're an artist and want me to play your Creative Commons licensed music, or if you are a listener and want to suggest an artist, please feel free to contact me. I'd love to hear from you!
Music submission requirements: (1) The song is Creative Commons licensed. (2) There's a public download link to the song (MP3 or OGG).

Subscribe to my podcast:

Vote for my podcast:

podster.de

Listen to my podcast with your phone:


From outside of Germany try +49 931 663927 408.
item.dc:creator: uwe@hermann-uwe.de (Uwe Hermann)

item.title: paniq - 8-Bit Pioneers
item.description:
paniq has released a new CC-licensed album named "From zero to hero". Quoting from the site:

This album supports the Piratenpartei Deutschland, which takes part in the general elections for the first time, and stands for freedom of information and open governance. Klarmachen zum Ändern!

There is no advertising budget. If you happen to like this album, please take the time to recommend it to your friends and colleagues.

Song: paniq - 8-Bit Pioneers (2:20 min, 4.3 MB)
License: CC-by-sa 3.0
Source: archive.org
Purchase from: ?
item.dc:creator: uwe@hermann-uwe.de (Uwe Hermann)

item.title: Please - Fluid Embrace
item.description:
Here's a nice track from "Please", a band from Sweden. To quote from the website:

Please consists of Lena and Andreas. Lena sings, Andreas tweaks sounds. Based in Malmö, Sweden they create delicate and stark electronic pop music. Their efforts this far have resulted in a string of infectious and powerful tracks[...]

Song: Please - Fluid Embrace (5:37 min, 13 MB)
License: CC-by-nc-nd 2.5 SE
Source: 23seconds.org
Purchase from: ?

item.title: Jammin*Inc - Was ist härter v2.0 GVL
item.description:
Remix of the first version of this song, specially crafted to protest against the GEZ/GVL mafia (German RIAA/MPAA) and their methods.

Die 2004 von der GVL angepeilte völlig unverhältnismässige Gebührenerhöhung veranlasste uns, unseren Beitrag zum Protest gegen diese Willkür zu leisten. Herausgekommen ist ein Remake des Tracks "Was Ist Hart".

Song: Jammin*Inc - Was ist härter v2.0 GVL special version (3:03 min, 3.5 MB)
License: CC-by-nc-sa 2.0 DE
Source: jamendo.com
Purchase from: ?
item.dc:creator: uwe@hermann-uwe.de (Uwe Hermann)
